 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶ֫פֶת‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** apparently ==stable, stall== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; √ dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפף‎</span>, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enclosure for sheep and goats***, but no satisfactory meaning of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפף‎</span> known); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפָתִים‎</span> [[Hab.3.17|Hab 3:17]] (for cattle). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָץ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוץ‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַץ‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצץ‎</span>.
